item.description:
Hello Photographers!

This months meeting is going to take place at the Worcester Art Museum!!

Which is right down the road from where we normally meet!

There is a parking lot on Lancaster Street so come in the Lancaster Street entrance of the Museum Just look for us in the cafe area. We will be announcing the winner of the Art In the Park Photo Contest!

This one meeting Begins at 7:00 PM We normally meet the Last Thursday of every month we do ask for a 5.00 donation to cover cost of snacks and drinks.

What to expect... from 7:00 to 8:00 will be open and social! Hanging out chit chatting will be encouraged! At 8 or so we will announce the winners. Then more socializing. We will have reps from the Museum as well as the Art in the Park Committee there. Its going to be a fun meeting! The Museum closes at 9pm so we have to be out of there by 9PM...

Looking forward to seeing you all there!

Cheers,
Donna
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups. We'll

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP
